name: cifti-correlation
author: Connectome Workbench Developers
description:
Generate correlation of rows in a cifti file.

For each row (or each row inside an roi if -roi-override is specified), correlate to all other rows.  The -cifti-roi suboption to -roi-override may not be specified with any other -*-roi suboption, but you may specify the other -*-roi suboptions together.

When using the -fisher-z option, the output is NOT a Z-score, it is artanh(r), to do further math on this output, consider using -cifti-math.

Restricting the memory usage will make it calculate the output in chunks, and if the input file size is more than 70% of the memory limit, it will also read through the input file as rows are required, resulting in several passes through the input file (once per chunk).  Memory limit does not need to be an integer, you may also specify 0 to calculate a single output row at a time (this may be very slow).

inputs.name: roi_override
inputs.description: perform correlation from a subset of rows to all rows

type.name: roi_override
type.description: perform correlation from a subset of rows to all rows

inputs.name: opt_left_roi_roi_metric
inputs.description: use an roi for left hempsphere: the left roi as a metric file

inputs.name: opt_right_roi_roi_metric
inputs.description: use an roi for right hempsphere: the right roi as a metric file

inputs.name: opt_cerebellum_roi_roi_metric
inputs.description: use an roi for cerebellum: the cerebellum roi as a metric file

inputs.name: opt_vol_roi_roi_vol
inputs.description: use an roi for volume: the volume roi file

inputs.name: opt_cifti_roi_roi_cifti
inputs.description: use a cifti file for combined rois: the cifti roi file

inputs.name: opt_weights_weight_file
inputs.description: specify column weights: text file containing one weight per column

inputs.name: opt_fisher_z
inputs.description: apply fisher small z transform (ie, artanh) to correlation

inputs.name: opt_no_demean
inputs.description: instead of correlation, do dot product of rows, then normalize by diagonal

inputs.name: opt_mem_limit_limit_gb
inputs.description: restrict memory usage: memory limit in gigabytes
